entity.name: Jared Kushner
entity.description: Senior Advisor to the President of the United States Jared Kushner

text:
Jared Kushner dumped a national testing plan early on in the pandemic because he thought COVID-19 was ONLY affecting Blue states. That's fucking genocide.

He should be in PRISON right now.
